Interface IConnectorDataGroupAdapter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConnectorDataGroupAdapter, Office365OneDriveDataGroupAdapter
    public interface IConnectorDataGroupAdapter
    Interface for custom datagroup adapter implementations.
